phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
Grey words cannot make anything happen
Wishing to fly freely across the sky
I dreamed it all my life
Step by step I go, though it is a doubtful world
Do not care how much I fall
Instinct is my guide, I never give up
To faraway future, I burst out running
Go beyond even the unseen fears
The vision I had, so I can be myself
Someday I will write the next page
I was able to meet you
Mornings start early for Magic Knights.
There are many things they must do.
But my heart belongs to Sister Lily.
You must endure, even if you are almost eaten by a beast.
In Front of the Captain's Room
You must wake up the captain of the Black Bulls, Yami Sukehiro.
Even though you are the one who told me to wake you up every morning!
Magic Knights must also deal with unreasonable demands.
Man, I have been working hard since the crack of dawn again.
Magic Knights sure have a lot of work to do.
Wait, how is this any different from what I was doing at the church?!
What are Magic Knights supposed to do anyway?!
There is nothing but meat for breakfast.
Noelle, why do not you help me with the cleaning and stuff?
But you are a newbie just like me!
I have never cleaned or done laundry in my life.
That is not something to brag about, is it?
We are in the same squad, are not we?
I am pretty sure you should be helping with that stuff.
Why are you talking to me like that?
What do Magic Knights do anyway?
We protect the kingdom and handle security!
It is the most manly job in the world, you dumbass!
Why did you decide to join when you knew nothing about it?
I am going to become the Wizard King.
I am going to barf everything back up!
They sure are lively first thing in the morning.
Can I have some of that energy?
You might even be able to get closer to some noble when you are assigned to protect them.
It is a super-fun job where you get to fight with enemies all you want.
If they are criminals, you can beat them up all you want and not get in trouble!
Most importantly, it is a wonderful job that my sister respects me for having.
I can buy her whatever she wants with my pay.
But if you lay a finger on Marie, I will kill you.
It is the best job in the world, since I get to save girls and be popular.
Of course I will tell you.
As long as you are a Magic Knight, you can eat plenty of food!
Well, basically, it is a good job.
I am looking forward to working with you on a mission.
Should I really be in this squad?
If you take this and this, and put them together and do this, it is really yummy.
Do you understand what Magic Knights do now?
We cannot bring any kids along.
This is a very important mission for adults.
Do not break everything while we are gone.
Will you fight me when you come back?
Can I go see Marie soon?
I mean, go on a mission, too.
Should I really be in this squad?
Captain Yami and Magna both looked so serious.
What kind of mission could it be?
That is six months worth of pay.
You have still got a ways to go, Magna.
Now I can buy some great gifts for everyone in the village on my way home.
But you do not have anything else to bet, do you?
You do not have any clothes or cash.
Let us do one last round.
If we win, we get everything back.
So let us do another round!
Er, you probably should not be betting that.
Use this moment to go beyond your limits!
If you lose, how about you do anything I ask?
Of course Mister Yami would never accept...
Old Man Seihi, say your prayers!
I wonder who will be saying their prayers...
You should be thankful that I even got out of bed.
I thought I was going to die.
I wonder if they finished their... mission?!
That old man actually had a royal straight flush!
We are no match for Old Man Seihi!
People sure are strong when they have something on the line.
Hey, Stupidsta, Lady Noe, we are back!
You two are going on your first mission
And so, we are giving you your first mission.
It had better be something worthy of me as a royal.
You will be hunting wild boars in Saussy Village!
Wh-What in the world is this lame mission?
I can beat a wild boar with my bare hands!
Do not you dare underestimate wild boars!
Have not you ever heard the phrase rushing into things?!
We both ended up losing to the mayor of Saussy Village.
He basically stripped us of all we had.
And six months worth of pay, too!
And we ended up promising him we would do anything if we lost,
so he asked us to take care of some wild boars for him.
Apparently, a herd showed up near the village, and they are ruining the fields.
Well, I will be waiting at my village.
Oh, I will at least return these to you.
That has nothing to do with us, right?
You two are the ones who lost!
You are asking Mister Yami to clean up his own mistakes?!
We are the ones who clean up Mister Yami's mistakes!
Are you going to go, or are you going to die?
Even though we are hunting wild boars, this is our first mission as Magic Knights.
I am supposed to get rid of wild boars?
I was just wondering if I should go, since I cannot control my magical powers.
You will be able to fix that in no time with some missions under your belt!
I will be sure to clean up any of you newbies' mistakes, since I am your senior.
Magna, you are such a manly man!
I-If you insist, I guess I could accompany you.
Why are you always looking down on us?!
It is just that you are always below me.
What kind of reasoning is that?!
Use your spatial magic to get us to Saussy Village.
What do you mean, you jerk?!
Well, I can only go to faraway places I cannot see
if I have marked them with my magical powers.
Meaning I cannot go to places I have never been to before.
Guess we do not have a choice.
I cannot fly on a broomstick!
Why cannot you do something so easy, you morons?!
That is as basic as it gets!
Well, I do not have any magical powers!
Why are you bragging about that?!
Well, I cannot control my magical powers, so of course I cannot.
And why do you sound so high and mighty?!
Guess I do not have a choice.
I will give you two a ride on my baby.
Are you not able to comprehend her majestic form?
Are you going to be all right?
A man never goes back on his word!
Crazy Cyclone can even handle three riders!
Do not get so close to me!
You cannot be serious, you mohawked delinquent!
Who are you calling a mohawked delinquent?!
We are one with the wind!
And if you do not want to die, get a little closer, Stupidsta!
What the hell are you two doing?!
So this is where the magic stone is located.
We are going to find it.
No one can escape from here
Once again in the small closed off classroom
The star of the class was shining yet again
They shine so bright that I close my eyes
That the revolution was within my hands
If you want to laugh, go ahead and laugh
The rest of us who were left behind wanted to become something
We repeat the same morning over and over
You are the only one who can choose your tomorrow
Let us go beyond our current selves
Is not Crazy Cyclone super cool?
Actually, I would probably call your head a crazy cyclone before I would your broom.
Who are you calling a cyclone?!
Apparently, you are okay with crazy.
We came here to hunt wild boars, but end up encountering a crazy enemy.
I am not going to forgive you for causing everyone so much trouble!
Not giving up is my magic!
